subTitle: topViewAboutMeSubtitle
luminelloFormParagraph: Please fill the brief consultation request from:

paragraphs.content: After you fill out the form, I will review the form and call you for a 15 minute brief phone call at no cost to you.
If we decide to move forward, we will schedule a new video consultation session for 75 minutes. (Please note Child and Adolescent patients may require 2 sessions for 60 minutes each)
In preparation for our first session, you will be asked complete a Comprehensive Intake Form via Luminello
At the end of our consultation session, we can determine a follow up schedule if we are a good fit or I will help you connect to other providers
